circle6  Record time of rupture of membranes and colour of 
amniotic fl uid.
/circle6 Never leave the woman alone.
/circle6 Allow her to remain mobile.
/circle6 Let her choose the position in which she is comfortable.
/circle6 If aft er eight hours, the contractions are stronger and more 
frequent but there is no progress in cervical dilatation, with 
or without rupture of the membranes, it indicates non-
progress of labour. Refer the woman urgently to an FRU.
